data.title: Louis Gossett Jr. Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Louis Gossett Jr. on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Louis Gossett Jr. including IF, Jaws 3, and more.
data.text:
Heeeeere's Lassie

After Lassiter moves into a new condominium building and strange things start happening to him, he is forced to hire Shawn and Gus to figure out what could be causing the supposed paranormal disturbance.

Reddick v Boseman

Founding partner, Carl Reddick, makes a surprise return to the firm. A renowned local pastor needs the firm's help in a legal matter that threatens to ruin his legacy. Lucca unexpectedly meets Colin's parents.

Thelma's Young Man

Thelma's boyfriend is a mysterious personage whom she refuses to present to her parents.

Lele pu na manu like

Thanksgiving brings Groverâs parents (guest stars Louis Gossett Jr. and Gladys Knight) and brother Percy, Jr. (Clifton Powel) to Oahu for a visit tainted by sibling rivalry, and Five-0 investigates a thief who is crushed to death by an empty safe.
